property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ If you have no shields, each of your creatures gets "blocker". (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a creature that has "blocker" to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent may choose one of their creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. If they do, return this creature to your hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Creatures that have "speed attacker" can't attack on the turn they are put. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Death Puppets. ■ Whenever your opponent discards cards from their hand, you may draw the same number of discarded cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone gets -2000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Melt Warriors. Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed, destroy all creatures that have power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each race you have in the battle zone other than Mystery Totem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ This creature doesn't untap at the start of your turn. ■ When one of your opponent's creatures attacks, untap this creature at the end of that turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: When you put this creature or one of your other creatures into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand. Your opponent discards all darkness and fire spells from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ No one can look through decks. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ If there are 6 or more creatures in the battle zone, destroy all of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If your opponent has more cards in their hand than you have in yours, draw until you have the same number of cards as them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you draw cards at the start of your turn, draw up to 2 additional cards. ■ At the end of each of your turns, tap 2 of your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be blocked. {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Whenever your opponent casts a fire or nature spell, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and return them to their owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature blocks, you may put a non-evolution creature that has "Blocker" from your hand into the battle zone tapped. If you do, return this creature to your hand and the tapped creature you put in the battle zone battles the attacking creature instead. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ When the crossed creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, you may return a creature in the battle zone to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: This creature gets +7000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent can't cast a light or nature spell that has the same name as a spell in their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ When the crossed creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker" and power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent casts a light or water spell, destroy one of your opponent's light or water creatures that has power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: While this creature is tapped, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +3000" and "double breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ All creatures in the battle zone can attack untapped multicolored creatures.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature's power is doubled. ■ If the crossed creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker". ■ If the crossed creature has power 15000 or more, it has "triple breaker" instead of "double breaker".
